hero.title: High Current Flexible Busbar Solutions for Critical Power Systems

company_strength.title: Why Industry Leaders Choose Yanghua STI
company_strength.description: Our commitment to innovation and quality is backed by extensive R&D capabilities, comprehensive quality assurance systems, and proven track records with Fortune 500 companies.

product_features.title: Engineered for Excellence
product_features.description: Our high current flexible busbar solutions are engineered to deliver exceptional performance and reliability in demanding industrial environments.

features.title: Safe & Reliable
features.description: Advanced safety features with comprehensive testing and certifications. Built to withstand extreme conditions with zero failure rate.

features.title: Convenient & Efficient
features.description: Quick installation with flexible design. Reduces installation time by 70% compared to traditional busbar systems.

features.title: Superior Performance
features.description: Optimized electrical performance with minimal power loss. Delivers consistent performance across 200-6300A range.

features.title: Cost Effective
features.description: Long-term value with reduced maintenance costs. Total cost of ownership 30% lower than conventional solutions.

application_areas.title: Proven Across Industries
application_areas.description: Our flexible busbar solutions are designed to meet the demanding requirements of various high-current applications across multiple industries.

industries.name: New Energy

partners.title: Trusted by Global Industry Leaders
partners.description: We partner with the world's most innovative companies to deliver cutting-edge power transmission solutions that power their critical operations.
